A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was one of the worst Star Wars movies ever made. The Force Awakens ended with a cliffhanger and left us with a lot of unanswered questions. After watching this movie\, most of them are still left unanswered. There was a huge opportunity for the writers to make greatness and they failed miserably. It was a joke. Bad humor throughout the entire movie. It now makes sense that Mark Hamill wasn't thrilled with the direction his character was going. It was a train wreck. It almost seems like the writers and director didn't bother watching The Force Awakens or any other Star Wars movie. I literally have no desire to see the next movie. When a fan since 1977 doesn't care about the next movie\, that says something. I won't buy the DVD or buy it on demand. It was really that bad.  Marvel knows how to make a good movie. Disney is really dropping the ball with this franchise.
